text: If we'd like to have a video conference with our sponsors and share our server desktop, is WebEx ok?

<@U1KRNTXL5> web conferencing with your sponsor is fine. Webex, GoToMeeting, etc, are fine.   Do the sharing from your laptop and then use Remote Desktop to bring up the practicum server.   The only restriction is I don't want you to give control of your laptop to the sponsor in a way that would allow them to control the practicum server.  Only the student team should ever control the practicum server.

<!channel> it's come up that this info is not completely disseminated, so please let your team know:  Windows' "Notepad" is antiquated and terrible and you should be using SublimeText or Notepad++ on the practicum server (or anywhere else) for looking at text files.  At this stage in early data wrangling, it's important for the team to not waste time with inferior text viewers.
